original_text: He keeps people safe from death, so that they do not go to their graves. He keeps people safe from death, so that they do not go to their graves. He keeps people safe from death,
korean_text: 그는 사람의 혼을 구덩이에 빠지지 않게 하시며 그 생명을 칼에 맞아 멸망하지 않게 하시느니라

sentences.original_text: He keeps people safe from death
so that they do not go to their graves
He keeps people safe from death
so that they do not go to their graves
He keeps people safe from death
